classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as diphenylmethanes. These are compounds containing a diphenylmethane moiety, which consists of a methane wherein two hydrogen atoms are replaced by two phenyl groups.

drug-interaction.name: Methylphenidate
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Methylphenidate is combined with Budipine.

drug-interaction.name: Dexmethylphenidate
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Dexmethylphenidate is combined with Budipine.

drug-interaction.name: Metoclopramide
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Budipine can be decreased when used in combination with Metoclopramide.
